channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 大谷翔平在社交媒体上分享了他新婚妻子的照片。她是前职业篮球运动员
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani shares a photo of his new wife on social media. She's a former pro basketball player https://t.co/vXjGzgi9K5

item.title: Lyft和Uber称将离开明尼阿波利斯市，因为市议会强迫它们向司机支付更多工资
item.description:
Lyft and Uber say they will leave Minneapolis after city council forces them to pay drivers more https://t.co/HG1PE5dGmz

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）、贾斯汀-维兰德（Justin Verlander）和布莱斯-哈珀（Bryce Harper）等 2200 多名职业球员接受过汤米-约翰手术。美联社介绍了这种手术的历史，以及它如何永远地改变了棒球比赛。
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani, Justin Verlander and Bryce Harper are among more than 2,200 pro players who have had Tommy John surgery. AP explains the history of the procedure — and how it changed the game of baseball forever. https://t.co/PKm9hr6lLI pic.twitter.com/XJlUEmDfhB

— AP Sports (@AP_Sports) March 14, 2024

item.title: 一名联邦法官驳回了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求撤销其机密文件刑事案件的申请。在数小时的辩论中，美国地区法官艾琳-坎农（Aileen Cannon）似乎还对另一项在审判前破坏起诉的努力持怀疑态度。
item.description:
A federal judge rejected a bid by Donald Trump to throw out out his classified documents criminal case. U.S. District Judge Aileen Cannon also appeared skeptical during hours of arguments of a separate effort to scuttle the prosecution ahead of trial. https://t.co/D140nObZlC

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 上诉法院认定被判藐视法庭罪的前特朗普白宫官员必须向监狱报到
item.description:
Ex-Trump White House official convicted of contempt must report to prison, appeals court finds https://t.co/3mSEoc3sM9

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）周四参观了一家计划生育诊所，她的办公室称这是总统或副总统首次参观实施堕胎手术的机构，白宫对生殖权利的捍卫正在升级。
item.description:
Vice President Kamala Harris visited a Planned Parenthood clinic on Thursday, marking what her office said was the first time a president or vice president has toured a facility that performs abortions, as the White House escalates its defense of reproductive rights. pic.twitter.com/n0DbqPfydU

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 责任、荣誉、愤怒：西点军校使命宣言的修改引发争议

item.title: 范德堡大学解雇了篮球队主教练杰里-斯塔克豪斯（Jerry Stackhouse），他执教范德堡大学篮球队五个赛季，取得了 70-92 的战绩，其中在东南联盟取得了 28-60 的战绩。
item.description:
Vanderbilt fires basketball coach Jerry Stackhouse after five seasons and a 70-92 record, including 28-60 in the Southeastern Conference. https://t.co/m7hqacsv76

item.title: 俄罗斯总统大选的第一轮投票已经开始，在普京扼杀异议之后，他的统治几乎肯定会延长。
item.description:
The first polls open in the Russian presidential election that’s all but certain to extend Vladimir Putin’s rule after he stifled dissent. https://t.co/VRV60O19wN

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周四，数学爱好者和面包师们共同庆祝了圆周率日（Pi Day），这一天是 3/14 日，也就是重要数学常数的前三位。在康涅狄格州诺沃克的米歇尔馅饼店，经理斯蒂芬-贾勒特（Stephen Jarrett）说，这是他们一年中最重要的日子之一。
item.description:
Math enthusiasts and bakers celebrated Pi Day on Thursday, corresponding to the date 3/14 that are the first three digits of the crucial mathematical constant. At Michele's Pies in Norwalk, Connecticut, manager Stephen Jarrett said it's one of their biggest days of the year. pic.twitter.com/CW7yJknbCd

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 14, 2024

item.title: "就像莱昂纳多-迪卡普里奥的弟弟杀死了总统。"《追捕》主演哈米什-林克莱特分享了他对 1865 年刺杀亚伯拉罕-林肯总统事件的了解。
